meanings.definition: Unable to be seen; not visible.
meanings.sent1: The ghost was invisible to everyone in the room.
meanings.sent2: The invisible ink revealed the secret message.
meanings.sent3: The invisible cat surprised us by suddenly appearing.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like an invisible thread connecting their hearts.
meanings.sent5: The invisible force of gravity keeps us grounded on Earth.

meanings.definition: People who work behind the scenes or are not typically noticed.
meanings.sent1: The invisibles backstage made the show run smoothly.
meanings.sent2: She was one of the invisibles who made the event a success.
meanings.sent3: The invisibles in the office always had the best gossip.
meanings.sent4: To him, the invisibles were the true heroes of the organization.
meanings.sent5: The invisibles in the kitchen prepared the most delicious meals.

meanings.definition: A type of financial assets that are not physical, such as stocks or bonds.
meanings.sent1: Investing in invisibles like stocks requires careful consideration.
meanings.sent2: She diversified her portfolio with various invisibles.
meanings.sent3: The invisibles in the market can be unpredictable at times.
meanings.sent4: His wealth was tied up in invisibles rather than tangible assets.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the world of invisibles is essential for financial success.
